about_the_game:
Our wish is to create a detailed simulation where players can try many different jobs and you will be able to earn extra money by doing side tasks, even if you are focused on your main job.

Additionally, we are planning to add a Co-Op mode, so you can team up with your friends and play special missions with different job roles at the same time. With this feature, we want to offer a more fun experience where players can cooperate and compete together.

In Seller Simulator, we are working hard to create a realistic atmosphere by reflecting the spirit and technology of past times. Our aim is to deliver a game that everyone can enjoy.

Throughout the development process, we will keep sharing videos like this. Your feedback and support mean a lot to us. See you soon!

short_description: A business life simulation set in the 1940s! Run into professions like jewellry making, banking, pharmacy, or tailoring. Expand your shop, serve customers, hire staff, play co-op with friends, and enjoy mini-games like checkers. More exciting features coming soon!
